DOC.brief_summary: This study intend evaluate efficacy , safety tolerability atacicept compare placebo explore neuroprotective effect atacicept assess OCT subject ON CIS . The study randomize . Study medication administer via subcutaneous ( skin ) injection .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis unilateral symptomatic optic neuritis first clinical manifestation within 28 day onset symptom study Day 1 Other protocol define inclusion criterion could apply Pre treatment immunosuppressant immunomodulating drug Relevant cardiac , hepatic renal disease Clinical significant abnormality blood cell count immunoglobulin level Clinical significant acute chronic infection Other protocol define exclusion criterion could apply
